name: Gingered Peach Sorbet
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, low-fat, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, dessert, ginger, nutmeg, peach, summer
recipeIngredient: 6 large ripe peaches, pitted, coarsely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Put the water in a saucepan. Add sugar, ground spices and vanilla extract. Bring the liquid to a boil. Lower the heat and simmer for 5 minutes, stirring until all the sugar has dissolved. Refrigerate until cold.
Put the peaches in a blender or food processor and puree until smooth. Pass the puree through a strainer. Refrigerate until cold.
Combine the chilled syrup and peach puree. Pour into a sorbet machine and proceed as directed.
